name: Mask Collector
description:
A 2D platformer game wherein you have to collect masks sequentially, find a key, and unlock the door to the next level. You have only one life to complete this game. Beware of fireballs, boulders, and guards because these are the ones that will send you back to square one. Good luck and happy collecting!

Controls

  • jump - SPACE
  • move left - LEFT ARROW
  • move right - RIGHT ARROW
